85C.name: 85°C Bakery Cafe
85C.menuCredit: Taken from their website, dated May 30, 2019.
85C.review: Since 85° focuses on baked goods, don't expect the drinks to be amazing. Their drinks are designed to compliment their bakery products, so sweetness is kept at a minimum. They offer two sizes and iced or hot options and often release unique flavors.

blackBall.name: BlackBall
blackBall.menuCredit: Found on Yelp.com page for San Gabriel, CA, location, uploaded by business owner.

blankSpace.name: Blank Space Cafe
blankSpace.menuCredit: Found on Pinterest.com: saved from Natasha Ulloa.
blankSpace.review: Blank Space offers a very wide range of flavors, and while size and temperature are customizable, sweetness is not. As a dessert house, their drinks run very sweet to match. Desserts offered include toast boxes, bubble waffles, ice cream, and macarons.

bobaUp.name: Boba Up
bobaUp.review: Boba Up is the first self-serve style bubble tea franchise in the area. To accommodate for differences in sweetness preferences, most drinks are very watered down, requiring customers to personally add shots of sugar into their drink (which is quite unsettling). Toppings are buffet-style, but do not seem to be kept chilled or warmed.

bobachine.name: Bobachine
bobachine.specialty: bubble tea, food, coffee, ice cream
bobachine.review: Bobachine is a "fusion" franchise, not focused on serving the standard Asian perception of bubble tea and its taste. They have one size, no sweetness customization, and tapioca not kept warm after cooking.

bobalust.name: BobaLust Tea House
bobalust.menuCredit: Posted by BobaLust Graphic Designer Cindy Huynh on chuynhdesign.com.
bobalust.review: BobaLust is a modern teahouse, and their drink sizes are a little smaller, but they win overall for the most original flavors. Some tend to be very sweet, but their unique names and descriptions convince customers to want to come back to try them all. In addition to their regular menu, they have a secret menu that rotates every month.

braganza.name: Braganza Tea
braganza.review: Braganza Tea is a Pacific Northwestern born franchise. They offer one drink size and no sweetness customization, but their tea quality is decent.

cafeHappy.name: Café Happy
cafeHappy.menuCredit: Menus differ greatly between locations. The original Kirkland location offers more customization and options than the University District Seattle location.
cafeHappy.review: Taste-wise, Café Happy is very generic, but is still a recommendation.

chatime.name: Chatime
chatime.review: Chatime is a classic teahouse. Drinks at Chatime are very customizable, and they offer a wide range of flavors and types to choose from. As the largest teahouse franchise in the world, Chatime is the safest option when unsure which to go to.

coco.name: CoCo Fresh Tea
coco.menuCredit: Found on Foursquare.com, uploaded by Karla T.
coco.review: CoCo is a classic teahouse, offers customizable drinks and is one of the world's largest teahouse franchises. Their default sweetness tends to be sweeter than most places.

decora.name: Decora Creamery
decora.menuCredit: Found on Twitter, posted by iamv @imtaiki.
decora.review: Decora is popular for its cotton candy products, but its tapioca is of decent quality. Although more on the jelly-texture side, their tapioca does have a bit chew factor in comparison to other Japanese jelly-tapiocas.

dingTea.name: Ding Tea
dingTea.menuCredit: Found on a Facebook post by Ding Tea PDX, July 28, 2018.
dingTea.review: Ding Tea is a classic teahouse and offers customization of their drinks. They are known for their golden and crystal boba, as they set them apart from other franchises.

gongCha.name: Gong Cha
gongCha.review: Gong Cha is a classic teahouse and often releases limited-time specialty drinks. They offer customization of their drinks and are very generous when it comes to toppings. They have no locations in Washington.

happyLemon.name: Happy Lemon
happyLemon.review: Happy Lemon puts a twist on the classic teahouse and is popular for its rock salt creama topping, unique from other franchises' similar creama toppings. They offer customization of their drinks.

itea.name: Itea Boba & Dessert
itea.review: Itea's shop gives off lively, adorable vibes. They offer a wide range of flavors and bubble waffles.

koiThe.name: Koi Thé
koiThe.review: Koi Thé is a classic teahouse, slowly growing its international presence. They offer customization of their drinks.
